comments.raw_text: User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.3) Gecko/20070309 Firefox/2.0.0.3 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US; rv:1.8.1.3) Gecko/20070309 Firefox/2.0.0.3 Any Page with HTML similar to this will double load. Reproducible: Always Steps to Reproduce: 1) put HTML into a file 2) load the page Actual Results: page will double load ( 2 http requests ) Expected Results: page should only load once Both the javascript inlcude, and the empty image tag are needed for this bug to surface, removing one or the other, will make the page go back to normal.

comments.text: causing an extra load of the same URL is not a bug. See bug 225554. Not sure why the javascript load is required. Maybe it has something to do with caching. *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 225554 ***
